show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
The Prescriptions for Health Radio Show for Friday, February 21st, 2014 is uploaded to Dropbox and here is the show… outline:Why the FDA’s criteria for approving new drugs will blow your mind!
Can you work out every day and still suffer from a sedentary lifestyle?
How can warning labels be dangerous?
How well does treatment work when your doctor lays a guilt trip on you?
Do coronary arteriograms cause strokes in everyone?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips: Some of Vicki’s favorite quotes, part 1 Some of Vicki’s favorite quotes, part 2
